isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - INSTALL - INSTALL FENDER EXTENSIONS

svcsubproc.title: Install Fender Extensions on 9100 i (SBA) and 9200 i (SBA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 34 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood tilted open, position fender extension (Item 6) in place on the under side of the cab (Item 10) and install three hex screw assembly fasteners with flat washers (Items 11 and 12) through the fender extension into the bottom of the cab, do not tighten, driver side shown.

Position fender extension (Item 6) against the side of the cab mounting bracket (Item 7) and install hex screw assembly fastener with special flat washer (Items 1 and 2) through the fender extension and the side of the cab mounting bracket and install flat washer, lock washer and hex nut (Items 5, 4 and 3), do not tighten, driver side shown.

Position fender extension (Item 6) against the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket (Item 9) and install two hex screw assembly fasteners (Item 8) through the fender extension into the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket and tighten, driver side shown.
Go back and tighten three hex screw assembly fasteners with flat washers (Item 11) into the bottom of the cab (Item 10), driver side shown.
Go back and tighten two hex screw assembly fasteners (Item 8) into the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket (Item 9), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side fender extension.
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: Install Fender Extensions on 9400 i (SBA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 35 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood tilted open, position fender extension (Item 6) in place on the under side of the cab (Item 10) and install three hex screw assembly fasteners with flat washers (Items 11 and 12) through the fender extension into the bottom of the cab, do not tighten, driver side shown.

Position fender extension (Item 6) against the side of the cab mounting bracket (Item 7) and install hex screw assembly fastener with special flat washer (Items 1 and 2) through the fender extension and the side of the cab mounting bracket. Install flat washer, lock washer and hex nut (Items 5, 4 and 3), do not tighten, driver side shown.

Position fender extension (Item 6) against the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket (Item 9) and install two hex screw assembly fasteners (Item 8) through the fender extension into the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket and tighten, driver side shown.
Go back and tighten three hex screw assembly fasteners with flat washers (Item 11) into the bottom of the cab (Item 10), driver side shown.
Go back and tighten two hex screw assembly fasteners (Item 8) into the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket (Item 9), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side fender extension.
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: Install Fender Extensions on 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 36 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood tilted open, position fender extension (Item 6) in place on top of the fender extension mounting bracket (Item 7) on the side of the cab (Item 8) and install two hex bolts with flat washers (Items 1 and 2) through the fender extension and fender extension mounting bracket. Install flat washer, lock washer and hex nut (Items 5, 4 and 3), do not tighten, driver side shown.

Position fender extension (Item 6) against the side of the fender extension weld nut mounting bracket (Item 12) and install hex bolt with lock washer and flat washer (Items 9, 10 and 11) through the fender extension, flat washer (Item 11) and into fender extension weld nut mounting bracket and tighten, driver side shown.
Go back and tighten two hex bolts (Item 1) and hex nut (Item 3), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side fender extension.
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rubber Fender Extensions on 5500 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 37 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood closed, position rubber fender extension (Item 6) on the outside of the hood assembly (Item 7) and install twelve hex bolts with nylon retainer washers (Items 1 and 2) through the rubber fender extension and hood assembly. Install twelve flat washers, lock washers and hex nuts, (Items 5, 4 and 3), do not tighten until all of the mounting bolts have been installed, driver side shown.
Once all twelve of the mounting bolts have been installed, go back and tighten all twelve hex bolts (Item 1) and hex nuts (Item 3), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side rubber fender extension.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rubber Fender Extensions on 5900 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 38 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood closed, position rubber fender extension (Item 6) on the outside of the hood assembly (Item 7) and install eleven hex bolts with nylon retainer washers (Items 1 and 2) through the rubber fender extension and hood assembly. Install eleven flat washers, lock washers and hex nuts, (Items 5, 4 and 3), do not tighten until all of the mounting bolts have been installed, driver side shown.
Once all of the eleven mounting bolts have been installed, go back and tighten all eleven hex bolts (Item 1) and hex nuts (Item 3), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side rubber fender extension.
